article_title: U.S. Health Care Costs Rise Faster Than Inflation

article_metadata.author: Mike Patton

og.description: U.S. health care costs continue to rise, despite the advent of the Affordable Care Act. In this article, we'll look at the annual increase for health care and compare it to overall inflation.
